title: What is the proper way of making Dua? (durood in the beginning & end)
transcript: Sadia says must be recite darude darude is the I think or do word for salutation upon the Prophet erase a lot of Salaam Isola - are the Nabi so must we recite this both at the beginning and at the end no you must not it is highly recommended in order for your dua to be accepted to do what the Prophet said that is salatu salam he said that every door is blocked between the earth and the heavens unless you pray a no facilitation to the Prophet as so we say in the beginning we praise Allah we say Allah humma salli wa sallim ala muhammad and then we make our dorm if you conclude your door with another salutation this is good but it is not a must
